import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Dashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{trendingQuizzes}=_ref;const[quizzes,setQuizzes]=useState(trendingQuizzes);useEffect(()=>{const sortedQuizzes=[...quizzes].sort((a,b)=>b.views-a.views);// Sort quizzes by views
setQuizzes(sortedQuizzes);},[quizzes]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stats-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"stat-number orange",children:quizzes.length}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Quiz Created"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"stat-number green",children:quizzes.reduce((total,quiz)=>total+quiz.questions.length,0)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Questions Created"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"stat-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"stat-number blue",children:quizzes.reduce((total,quiz)=>total+(quiz.views||0),0)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Total Impressions"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"trending-quizzes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Trending Quizzes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"quizzes-grid",children:quizzes.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No trending quizzes available."}):quizzes.map((quiz,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"quiz-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:quiz.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"quiz-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"views",children:quiz.views||0}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:quiz.icon,alt:"Icon",className:"quiz-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"created-date",children:["Created on: ",quiz.createdDate]})]})]},index))})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
